attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
According to WWF, WWF has calculated that if everyone in the world consumed as many natural resources and produced as much carbon dioxide as we do in the UK we would need three planets. If we want to continue enjoying a good quality of life, it's vitally important that we all take responsibility for saving energy, reducing waste and limiting our carbon output.

The good news is it's not too late to take action. And by making just a few small adjustments to your daily life you can help to reduce your ecological footprint and make the planet a better place for everyone.
